description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Lusaka, Zambia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Contemporary Zambia Embassy District Retreat
hotels.description: In the heart of the embassy district of Zambia's capital, InterContinental Lusaka, an IHG Hotel, is an oasis of rest and relaxation for the discerning traveller. In close proximity to most government and corporate offices, the modern hotel is the ideal venue for travellers looking to unwind and rest after a hard day of work. Unwind at the Makumbi Club Lounge or revitalise yourself at the outdoor pool and fitness centre.

seo.title: Hotel a Lusaka - Zambia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Lusaka, Zambia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
